body_html:
You can fix this by adding the appropriate files/targets to the pip_backage rule here.

Basically, you want to add all the py_binary targets defined in tensorflow/python/tools/BUILD (but none of the tests.

I'd love a PR.
body_text:
You can fix this by adding the appropriate files/targets to the pip_backage rule here.
Basically, you want to add all the py_binary targets defined in tensorflow/python/tools/BUILD (but none of the tests.
I'd love a PR.
body:
You can fix this by adding the appropriate files/targets to the pip_backage rule [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD#L34). 

Basically, you want to add all the `py_binary` targets defined in tensorflow/python/tools/BUILD (but none of the tests.

I'd love a PR.
